subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins, the former Tour de France winner, has broken cycling’s prestigious hour record, covering 54.526 kilometers (33.88 miles) in an hour in London’s Olympic Park.
snippet: Bradley Wiggins, the former Tour de France winner, has broken cycling’s prestigious hour record, covering 54.526 kilometers (33.88 miles) in an hour in London’s Olympic Park.
